segments.text: Would you like cream or sugar in your coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a little sugar , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I don't have any sugar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why did you ask me if I wanted some ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I just wasn't thinking .
segments.speaker: S1
